name: MediHealth Global Innovation, Inc.
description: Developer of a mobile-based medical platform designed to offer medical services at home. The company's platform is a home doctor service application that offers doctors, medications and laboratories anytime anywhere in less than 90-minutes, enabling patients and their family members to pick medical services as per requirement and get 24/7 healthcare consultation services at home.
one_liner: Developer of a mobile-based medical platform designed to offer medical services at home. The company's platform is a home doctor service application that offers doctors, medications and laboratories anytime anywhere in less than 90-minutes, enabling patients and their family members to pick medical services as per requirement and get 24/7 healthcare consultation services at home.
